effects.title: Does the changes affect the performance specification of the MD?
Does the changes affect materials of the MD?
Does the changes introduce new hazards which have not been previously addressed?
Does the changes affect the risks associated with existing hazards?
Does the changes alter the details on compliannce with the essential requirements given in the design / type approval dossier submitted to the Notified Body?
Does the changes alter the details on intended use given in the design / type approval dossier submitted to the Notified Body?
Does the changes mean that the device will have different end users or be used in a different manner?

Does the changes mean that the clinical data/performance evaluation data for the original device is not sufficient to confirm conformity of the changed device with the required characteristics and perfrmance?
Is the changes a direct result of actions taken related to concerns arising from incidents/recalls/complaints?

software_version_checklist.justification: This version includes small improvements and bug fixes. This version has an improved finger detection system.
